flawed_nl_solution:
Combining Hermione and Luna has 14 + 17 = <<14+17=13>>13 spelling badges.
Removing their spelling badges from the total, Celestia has 83 - 13 = <<83-13=70>>70 spelling badges.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 31, not 13. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
